text: Adidas This is a list of Adidas sponsorships. ==American football== * Aaron Rodgers * Von Miller * Mario Williams * Kendall Wright * Scooby Wright * Alvin Kamara * Juju Smith-Schuster * Patrick Mahomes * Anthony Johnson * Deandre Hopkins * Tyler Lockett * Jalen Ramsey * Derwin James * Adam Thielen * Tua Tagovailoa * Stefon Diggs * Eddie Jackson ==Association football== The Adidas factory outlet in Herzogenaurach, Germany Adidas produces the kits of many association football teams around the world, as well as producing the balls used in the UEFA Champions League matches and FIFA World Cup tournaments since 1970.History of adidas balls used in World Cup ===Competitions=== ====FIFA World Cup==== {|class="wikitable" |- !Edition !Host !Tournament ball |- |1970 | |Telstar |- |1974 | |Telstar Durlast |- |1978 | |Tango |- |1982 | |Tango España |- |1986 | |Azteca México |- |1990 | |Etrusco Unico |- |1994 | |Questra |- |1998 | |Tricolore |- |2002 | |Fevernova |- |2006 | |Teamgeist |- |2010 | |Jabulani |- |2014 | |Brazuca |- |2018 | |Telstar 18 |} ====UEFA European Championship==== {| class="wikitable" |- !Edition !Host !Tournament ball |- |1992 | |Etrusco Unico |- |1996 | |Questra Europa |- |2000 | |Terrestra Silverstream |- |2004 | |Roteiro |- |2008 | |Europass |- |2012 | |Tango 12 |- |2016 | |Beau Jeu |- |2021 | |Uniforia |} ====Africa Cup of Nations==== {| class="wikitable" |- !Edition !Host !Tournament ball |- |2008 | |Wawa Aba |- |2010 | |Jabulani Angola |- |2012 | |Comoequa |- |2013 | |Katlego |- |2015 | |Marhaba |} ====Olympic Games==== {| class="wikitable" |- !Edition !Host !Tournament ball |- |1996 | |Questra Olimpia |- |2000 | |Gamarada |- |2004 | |Pelias |- |2008 | |Teamgeist Beijing |- |2012 | |The Albert |- |2016 | |Errejota |} Adidas is also the official ball supplier for the following competitions: * FIFA World Cup * FIFA Club World Cup * UEFA Champions League * UEFA Super Cup * UEFA Youth League * UEFA Futsal Champions League ====Domestic leagues==== * Primera División * Austrian Bundesliga * First Division * Subroto Cup * J. League * Premier League * K League * Fortuna Liga * Ekstraklasa * Major League Soccer * Primera División * División Intermedia The company has supplied the ball for the UEFA European Championship ever since 1984, starting with the Tango Italia, and also produces the Finale ball for use in the UEFA Champions League. ===International confederations=== * FIFA ===National associations=== ====Africa==== Thomas Jaeschke * Jordan Larson * Dustin Watten == Other Adidas sponsorships == * Title sponsor for the Vancouver Marathon during 2001–2005 (since been taken over by the Bank of Montreal, though the marathon is still presented by Adidas) * Official sponsor for the Boston Marathon since 1988. * Sponsor of San Francisco's Zazzle Bay to Breakers footrace * Secondary sponsor of Fernando Alonso in Formula One * Wah Yan College, Kowloon, HK The college received jackets and other suits from Adidas. * Western Carolina University "Pride of the Mountains" Marching Band. The band received 410 Adidas track suits, personalized with the "Pride of the Mountains" Logo. * Sponsorship of Wojbethelnation2nd (group of comedians/sports-lovers involving Jordan Wojciechowski, David Bethel, and Avery Warner). * Collierville High School (Collierville, TN) in sponsored by Adidas. All athletic teams are branded with the three stripes logo. * Official sponsor for the Campioni per la ricerca since 2016. * Official sponsor of Sport Mediaset since 2016. * Professional Video Gaming (eSports) organization Team Vitalityhttp://www.espn.com/esports/story/_/id/18440999/adidas-becomes-team- vitality-jersey-outfitter ==See also== * List of Puma sponsorships * List of Nike sponsorships * List of ASICS sponsorships * List of Under Armour sponsorships ==References== Adidas Sponsorships
